announcements.title: 351 Tagging Weekend
announcements.subtitle: October 11, 2025
announcements.details:
The Tagging Weekend is the squadron's primary fundraising event, organized and managed by the Squadron Sponsoring Committee (SSC). Cadets are expected to complete at a minimum one (1) Tagging shift this fall.

Tagging Headquarters: Bur Oak Secondary. 933 Bur Oak Ave, Markham

Dress: Level One Cadets - Black and White. Civilian jacket if needed
Level 2 or above - C3 (tunic, ribbon, shirt, and tie), Cadet Parka if needed.

announcements.title: Marksmanship Workshop
announcements.subtitle: October 10, 2025
announcements.details:
351 will hold a series of marksmanship workshops on 15, 22, and 29 of October 2025. This workshop series is designed to help cadets who are interested in marksmanship and have shown strong shooting skills further develop their abilities. Participants will receive focused coaching and practice opportunities to prepare for a competition tryout.

Cadets who wish to attend must sign up by 14 Oct 2025 and must be available for all 3 sessions.

Date: 15, 22, 29 of October 2025
Time: 1900 hr to 2130 hrs
Location: St. Julia Billart Catholic School Gym
Address: 2070 Bur Oak Ave, Markham

What to bring: Health Card, water bottle, pens, and a notebook.
Dress: Sports wear (T-shirt, long track pants, and non-marked running shoes)

announcements.title: Weekly Sports Night - Come out and play!
announcements.subtitle: Every Friday
announcements.details:
Hey Cadets! Looking to stay active with your fellow cadets? Sports Night is back every Friday, and we want you there! Whether you're into basketball, soccer, volleyball or just want to try something new, this is your chance to get involved, have fun, and even discover a new favourite sport!

When: Every Friday
Where: Franklin Street Public School. 21 Franklin St, Markham.
Time: 1900 - 2130 hrs

To help us plan and bring the sports you want to play, please take 30 seconds to complete this SURVEY.

announcements.title: Online Ground School 2025-26
announcements.subtitle: September 26, 2025
announcements.details:
The National Ground School Program (NGSP) is required for those applying for the Glider Pilot Training Course (GPTC) or the Power Pilot Training Course (PPTC) this training year. The national lesson runs from November 2025 to January 2026. It concludes with a qualifying exam in January/February 2026, which forms part of the overall selection score.

Sign-up for the National Ground School Program is due by 10 Oct 2025.

Format: Online
Lesson Period: From 1 November 2025 to 21 January 2026
Qualifying Exam: Delivered 1st week in February (dates TBD) at local squadron

351 Silver Star Squadron will run local classes to support our future pilots. Training is supported by licensed pilots and flight instructors.

announcements.title: 351 Gliding Day 2
announcements.subtitle: October 11, 2025
announcements.details:
A gliding day will be held on Saturday, 11 Oct 2025 at CFB Borden. Transportation and lunch will be provided.

Cadets who are interested in participating are required to sign up by Friday, 3 October 2025. The Joining Instruction (JI) will only be sent to the selected cadets via Cadet365 email.

Please note that sign-up does not guarantee a spot.

announcements.title: 2025 Biathlon Team - Sign-up
announcements.subtitle: September 15, 2025
announcements.details:
The 351 Biathlon Team will hold practices on Saturdays, starting 20 Sept, 2025. Selected cadets will compete in the Central Ontario Area Biathlon Competition in Nov 2025.

Practices: Saturdays, beginning 20 Sept
Time: 1830 - 2100 hrs
Location: 145 Royal Crest Court, Unit 28, Markham, ON.
Selection: Try-out will be held in Oct
Dress: Athletic wear and running shoes. Cadets are recommended to dress in layers.

Phase one of training will be endurance training in preparation for the Run & Shoot Competition. Cadets who are interested in the training should sign up by 18 Sept.

announcements.title: Uniform Exchange
announcements.subtitle: September 6, 2025
announcements.details:
Cadets with ill-fitting uniform parts may submit an exchange request for a better size through the Dashboard. To do this, click the 'Exchange' button located at the bottom of the dashboard under the 'Supply' section.

Pick-up Location: All exchanges must be picked up from the Squadron Office on a designated Supply Night.
Squadron Office Address: Unit 5 - 185 Riviera Drive, Markham, ON L3R 5J6

Supply Night Schedule:
- 11 September 2025
- 25 September 2025
- 23 October 2025
- 20 November 2025
- 11 December 2025
Time: 6:30 pm to 8:30 pm

Walk-Ins: Cadets may drop by during Supply Hours without a prior request, but availability cannot be guaranteed.

announcements.title: 2025 Year End BBQ Night
announcements.subtitle: June 24, 2025
announcements.details:
Join us as we wrap up the training year with a fun and relaxing BBQ night! Enjoy great food, games, and company as we celebrate everyone's achievements.

Date: Tuesday, 24 June 2025
Time: 1830 - 2130 hrs
Location: Cornerstone Community Church - Parking Lot. 9680 Ninth Line, Markham, ON

Ration: Free of charge for 351 staff and cadets. Sign-up is required.
Parents are welcome to join. Please sign up in advance. Tickets are $15 per person, payable at the event.
